item.description:
Pizza Party at Peppercorns!

Come join us for our first NCM Wicca Meet-up Planning Meeting, at Peppercorns Restaurant in Worcester Mass. on Saturday November, 24th from 5:00-7:00 pm, for appetizers/pizza and drinks. This will be a meet and greet, get-to-know each other, and a discussion of events and activities the group would like to plan for 2008, including convenient future meeting places for members. This will be a "dutch treat" event.
Peppercorns is located at 455 Park Ave, in Worcester, Mass.

For more information, please feel to call me at: (508) 847- 7677.
item.name: 1st Planning Group for NCM Meet-up
